Package com.feathersui.maven.plugin.lime_openfl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Represents the <app> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Architecture
    Represents the <architecture> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Assets
    Represents the <assets> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    BaseBuildMojo
    The base class for Lime/OpenFL build goals.
    BaseMojo
    The base class for all Lime/OpenFL goals.
    BuildMojo
    Builds a Lime, OpenFL, or Feathers UI project.
    BuildTestsMojo  
    Certificate
    Represents the <certificate> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Dependency
    Represents the <dependency> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    GenerateProjectXmlMojo
    Generates a project.xml file for a Lime, OpenFL, or Feathers UI project.
    HaxeDef
    Represents the <haxedef> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    HaxeFlag
    Represents the <haxeflag> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Haxelib
    Represents the <haxelib> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Icon
    Represents the <icon> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Include
    Represents the <include> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Java
    Represents the <java> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Language
    Represents the <language> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    LaunchImage
    Represents the <launchImage> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Library
    Represents the <library> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    LimeProject
    Defines a Lime, OpenFL, or Feathers UI project in your Maven pom.xml file for GenerateProjectXmlMojo.
    Meta
    Represents the <meta> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Ndll
    Represents the <ndll> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    PostBuild
    Represents the <postbuild> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    PreBuild
    Represents the <prebuild> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Sample
    Represents the <sample> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Section
    Represents the <section> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    SetEnv
    Represents the <setenv> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Source
    Represents the <source> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    SystemPath
    Represents the <path> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    Template
    Represents the <template> element of the Lime project.xml format.
    TestMojo  
    Window
    Represents the <window> element of the Lime project.xml format.
